document.full_text: evacuations were lifted on friday for thousands of homeowners who fled a wind-stoked wildfire southeast of denver, but fire managers warned much of eastern colorado remains at high risk for wildfires because of drought-like conditions.
document.title: colorado residents who fled wildfire returning home
lines_and_colors: evacuations were lifted on friday for thousands of homeowners who fled a wind-stoked wildfire southeast of denver, but fire managers warned much of eastern colorado remains at high risk for wildfires because of drought-like conditions.
